UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions taken in prior period tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsReductionsResulti.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Reduction Resulting from Lapse of Applicable Statute of Limitations
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsReductionsResulti.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from lapses of applicable statutes of limitations.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits that Would Impact Effective Tax Rate
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.description: The total amount of unrecognized tax benefits that, if recognized, would affect the effective tax rate.

NoncontrollingInterestDecreaseFromDecons.label: Noncontrolling Interest, Decrease from Deconsolidation
NoncontrollingInterestDecreaseFromDecons.description: The amount of the reduction or elimination during the period of a noncontrolling interest resulting from the parent's loss of control and deconsolidation of the entity in which one or more outside parties had a noncontrolling interest.

DerivativeInstrumentsAndHedges.label: Derivative Instruments and Hedges, Assets
DerivativeInstrumentsAndHedges.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the asset arising from derivative instruments and hedging activities, which are expected to be converted into cash or otherwise disposed of within a year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

MinorityInterestDecreaseFromDistribution.label: Noncontrolling Interest, Decrease from Distributions to Noncontrolling Interest Holders
MinorityInterestDecreaseFromDistribution.description: Decrease in noncontrolling interest balance from payment of dividends or other distributions by the non-wholly owned subsidiary or partially owned entity, included in the consolidation of the parent entity, to the noncontrolling interest holders.

PaymentsRelatedToTaxWithholdingForShareB.label: Payment, Tax Withholding, Share-based Payment Arrangement
PaymentsRelatedToTaxWithholdingForShareB.description: Amount of cash outflow to satisfy grantee's tax withholding obligation for award under share-based payment arrangement.

ProceedsFromLinesOfCredit.label: Proceeds from Lines of Credit
ProceedsFromLinesOfCredit.description: Amount of cash inflow from contractual arrangement with the lender, including but not limited to, letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueAcquisitions.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Acquisitions
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueAcquisitions.description: Value of stock issued pursuant to acquisitions during the period.

AntidilutiveSecuritiesExcludedFromComput.label: Antidilutive Securities Excluded from Computation of Earnings Per Share, Amount
AntidilutiveSecuritiesExcludedFromComput.description: Securities (including those issuable pursuant to contingent stock agreements) that could potentially dilute basic earnings per share (EPS) or earnings per unit (EPU) in the future that were not included in the computation of diluted EPS or EPU because to do so would increase EPS or EPU amounts or decrease loss per share or unit amounts for the period presented.

ProceedsFromDerivativeInstrumentInvestin.label: Proceeds from Derivative Instrument, Investing Activities
ProceedsFromDerivativeInstrumentInvestin.description: The cash inflow provided by derivative instruments during the period, which are classified as investing activities, excluding those designated as hedging instruments.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, New Issues
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.description: Equity impact of the value of new stock issued during the period. Includes shares issued in an initial public offering or a secondary public offering.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsGross.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Gross
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsGross.description: Amount before amortization of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsNet.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Net
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsNet.description: Amount after amortization of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life.

ContractWithCustomerAssetNetCurrent.label: Contract with Customer, Asset, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
ContractWithCustomerAssetNetCurrent.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time, classified as current.

ContractWithCustomerAssetNetNoncurrent.label: Contract with Customer, Asset, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Noncurrent
ContractWithCustomerAssetNetNoncurrent.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time, classified as noncurrent.

ContractWithCustomerLiabilityCurrent.label: Contract with Customer, Liability, Current
ContractWithCustomerLiabilityCurrent.description: Amount of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable, classified as current.

ContractWithCustomerLiabilityNoncurrent.label: Contract with Customer, Liability, Noncurrent
ContractWithCustomerLiabilityNoncurrent.description: Amount of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable, classified as noncurrent.

DebtCurrent.label: Debt, Current
DebtCurrent.description: Amount of short-term debt and current maturity of long-term debt and capital lease obligations due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateContinuingOperatio.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateContinuingOperatio.description: Percentage of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

LongTermDebtNoncurrent.label: Long-term Debt, Excluding Current Maturities
LongTermDebtNoncurrent.description: Amount after unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs of long-term debt classified as noncurrent and excluding amounts to be repaid within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer. Includes, but not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, debentures, mortgage loans and commercial paper. Excludes capital lease obligations.

RepaymentsOfAccountsReceivableSecuritiza.label: Repayments of Accounts Receivable Securitization
RepaymentsOfAccountsReceivableSecuritiza.description: Repayments of securitizations of receivables treated as collateralized borrowings, which are classified as financing transactions.

RepaymentsOfDebt.label: Repayments of Debt
RepaymentsOfDebt.description: The cash outflow during the period from the repayment of aggregate short-term and long-term debt. Excludes payment of capital lease obligations.
